page.title: 11Education _ Leck Area
page.content: In our block there is now just one primary school, but there used to be two others.We are in Lancashire, but close to the Cumbrian border.This area of Lancashire has not been reorganised along comprehensive lines, and children still take an 11+ exam.If you pass, you can go to the Lancaster Royal Grammar School .If not you go to the Lunesdale Secondary Modern School. There are two other alternatives. Firstly, you can sometimes choose to go to a comprehensive school at Carnforth which is in Lancashire. Secondly you can sometimes go to Queen Elizabeth's School in Kirkby Lonsdale, Cumbria if there is room. If you have passed the 11+, or if you have an older brother or sister at Queen Elizabeth's School, there is more chance of you going there.
